overview: When a powerful crime-lord's money is stolen, it's up to amateur investigator Nick Westover to find it. With the help of current gangster Joe Kollins to navigate this underworld of violence and questionable characters, he's gonna learn that sometimes money can make people do crazy things...
tagline: Guns, Drugs, Gangsters? Still better than a day at school though, right?
title: Shoreline Charade
